Articles.Content: Just a quick question.. My steam is telling me that I need to update KSP to play, but it wont install any update. Before I do a full reinstall (grrr) is anyone else having a similar issue?

A lot of people are already discussing the latest Steam update: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115127-Steam-is-updating-KSP-Bye-bey-64Bit](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115127-Steam-is-updating-KSP-Bye-bey-64Bit) You might find an answer there.

Always try to validate game cache with steam prior to a full re-install!

[https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=2037-QEUH-3335](https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=2037-QEUH-3335)
